segments.text: I finished Young Primary School in 1998 , and entered Xi â€™ an Middle School that same September . I graduated from there in July of 2004 , and that September I entered Wuhan University , where I'm studying now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you think the education you have received will contribute to your work in this company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I have a good understanding of fundamentals in the areas your company deals with , and I can go on from here to build up the specific skills and knowledge I need to do my job well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your graduation thesis was on Medical Application of Laser , right ? What were your conclusions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I did some work on that , and I found out some really interesting things about the conductivity of liquid helium . I was sure I had a great discovery until my teacher told me the same discovery already made twenty years ago . I think the most important thing , I learnt though , was the importance of keeping good records .
segments.speaker: S2
